task.title: Modify an Existing Comment for a Variable

step.cmd: Depending on the status of an activity, select Perform or In Progress for the activity associated with the variable.
step.stepresult: The page for entering data for the modifiable variables appears.

step.cmd: Select , and then select Add/Edit Comment for a variable.
step.stepresult: A comments list in the window for entering comments for the selected variable appears.
The EDIT COMMENT box appears, displaying the current comment.

step.cmd: Modify the comment, and then select Save.
step.stepresult: An informational message stating that the comment was successfully modified appears in the page for entering data for the modifiable variables. The position of a comment in the comments list remains constant even if you modify the comment later.

taskbody.result: The changes to the variable comment are saved.
